Normally there is a 50%/50% chance of a Angel or Devil room with if a door spawns after the boss. The Rosary Bead changes this to a 75%/25% chance of an angel or devil room (respectively).

items.name: Rusted Key
effects: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find keys and chests.

items.name: Safety Cap
effects: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find pills.

items.name: Samson's Lock
effects: When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to get +0.5 damage up for the current room.

items.name: Store Credit
effects: While this trinket is held, all items in the Shop cost 0 coins.
After buying any 0 cent item in the Shop, the trinket disappears.

items.name: Swallowed Penny
effects: Each time you get hit, you drop a coin or two.

items.name: Tick
effects: When you enter a boss room, immediately remove 15% health from the boss and restore 1 red heart.
This trinket cannot be replaced or dropped, meaning you are unable to take any more trinkets unless you get the Mom's Purse item.

items.name: Umbilical Cord
effects: If you take damage which leaves you at 1/2 a heart, you gain a Little Steve familiar that follows you and shoots homing tears.

items.name: Whip Worm
effects: +0.5 Shot Speed Up.
Your tears now whip across the room at a very high shot speed.
Shot speed gives your tears more effective range, but doesn't increase your range stat directly.

items.name: Wiggle Worm
effects: Tears now move in a wave fashion across the room.

items.name: O - The Fool
effects: Teleports the player to the starting room of the current floor.

items.name: I - The Magician
effects: For the current room, tears now have the Spoon Bender effect, which allows them to curve towards enemies and gives them a purрle appearance.
items.description: May you never miss your goal

items.name: II - The High Priestess
effects: Summons Mom's foot which will stomp on a random enemy in the current room, dealing 300 damage.
If no enemies are in the current room, the foot will target Isaac (and do damage if it hits), however it can be used to break rocks.

items.name: III - The Empress
effects: Gives the player the Whore of Babylon effect for the current room, increasing damage and speed.

items.name: IV - The Emperor
effects: Teleports the player to the Boss room on the current floor.

items.name: V - The Hierophant
effects: Spawns 2 Soul hearts on the floor.

items.name: VI - The Lovers
effects: Spawns 2 red hearts on the floor.
items.description: May you prosper and be in good health

items.name: VII - The Chariot
effects: Grants the same effect as 'My Little Unicorn', which makes Isaac invincible and deal 40 contact damage to enemies per hit.

items.name: VIII - Justice
effects: Spawns 1 bomb, 1 key, 1 coin, 1 heart, which can be random variants of each.

items.name: IX - The Hermit
effects: Teleports the player to the Shop.
On or below the Womb, this acts as a random teleport, since there are no shops on those floors.
items.description: May you see what life has to offer

items.name: X - Wheel of Fortune
effects: Spawns a Slot Machine or a Fortune Machine.

items.name: XI - Strength
effects: Gives the player the Magic Mushroom effect, which increasing size and all stats by 1 for the current room.
If you use the Strength card with 12 heart containers, it will take you down to 11 when you leave the room.

items.name: XII - The Hanged Man
effects: Gives the player the flying effect for the current room, allowing the player to fly over obstacles in the room.
This card is useless if you have any item which allows you to permanently fly.

items.name: XIII - Death
effects: Deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room in a similar style to the Necronomicon.
items.description: Lay waste to all that oppose you

items.name: XIV - Temperance
effects: Spawns a Blood Donation Machine.
items.description: May you be pure in heart

items.name: XV - The Devil
effects: Gives the Book of Belial effect for the current room, increasing damage.
items.description: Revel in the power of your darkness

items.name: XVI - The Tower
effects: Spawns some troll bombs at random locations in the current room.
Each bomb deals 60 damage (normal bomb damage.

items.name: XVII - The Stars
effects: Teleports the player to the Item Room.
On or below the Womb, this acts as a random teleport, since there are no item rooms on those floors.
items.description: May you find what you desire

items.name: XVIII - The Moon
effects: Teleports the player to the Secret Room.
items.description: May you find all you have lost

items.name: XIX - The Sun
effects: A card with three uses: A full heal, deals 100 damage to all enemies in the current room and reveals the entire map for the current floor (Treasure Map + The Compass).
items.description: May the light heal and enlighten you

items.name: XX - Judgement
effects: Spawns a beggar.
Has a chance to be a demon beggar.
Killing a Devil Beggar, Key Master, or Shell Game Beggar gives you an increased chance of finding Angel rooms instead of Devil rooms. See the dedicated Devil room page for more details.

items.name: XXI - The World
effects: Reveals the entire map and shows the icons for every room which has one.
This is completely useless if you currently have both the Treasure Map and The Compass.

items.name: 2 of Spades
effects: Doubles the number of keys you have.
If you have no keys, it gives you two.

items.name: 2 of Clubs
effects: Doubles the number of Bombs you have.
If you have no bombs, it gives you two.

items.name: 2 of Hearts
effects: Doubles your current red hearts up to full health.
If you have half a heart left, the card recovers your first two heart containers.
This card is useless for the Bluе Baby.

items.name: 2 of Diamonds
effects: Doubles the number of coins you have.
If you have no coins, it gives you two.

items.name: The Joker
effects: Teleports you to the Devil Deal Room on the current floor.

items.name: Chaos Card
effects: A card which can be thrown as a projectile directly infront of Isaac, instantly killing anything it hits.
...Yes that includes every boss in the game!
If thrown at a multi-phase boss like Satan, it will only kill that particular phase of the boss.
Will destroy rocks and poop in its path.
Can also be thrown against a door to open it (Doesn't work against Mega Satan's door).

items.name: Credit Card
effects: When used, removes the price tag from all items in the current shop or devil deal, making everything free.
The effect of the Credit Card only lasts for the current room.

items.name: Rules Card
effects: Displays a random cryptic message on the screen similar to the fortune machine ones. One of the following messages may show:
"Rooms may yield more than you expect"
"Some doors require a blessing. Carry them with you"
"The walls will harden over time. Time is the essence"
"Sleeping gatekeepers will need to be awoken with a loud sound"
A piece of paper is your guide"
Deny his gifts to attain your reward"
A dark market lies under your feet
Chub dislikes smoke!

items.name: Card Against Humanity
effects: When used, fills the entire room with poop!

items.name: Suicide King
effects: When used, instantly kills you and spawns 10 pickup on the floor.
Each of the 10 things spawned can be any type of consumable or sometimes a pedestal item (up to a maximum of 3 pedestal items).
Any pedestal item created by Suicide King will be related to the room where it was used, meaning that using it in the Angel room will spawn Angel room items.

items.name: Rune of Algiz
effects: When used, gives you an invincibility effect which lasts for 30 seconds (much longer than normal invincibility effects).

items.name: Rune of Ansuz
effects: When used, reveals the entire map including all the secret room locations and other icon rooms.

items.name: Rune of Berkano
effects: Summons 3 blue friendly spiders and 3 blue flies.

items.name: Rune of Dagaz
effects: Removes the curse which is in effect on the current floor.
Can also cure the effect of the Amnesia pill.
+1 Soul Heart.

items.name: Rune of Ehwaz
effects: Creates a trapdoor on the floor (Same effect as We Need To Go Deeper).

items.name: Rune of Hagalaz
effects: When used, this rune will destroy all breakable objects in the current room, such as poop, rocks and skulls.

items.name: Rune of Jera
effects: When used this rune will double all pickups on the floor in the room.
Creates copies of pickups, even if you haven't purchased them yet.
Can be used to double the number of golden item chests in the first room of the final Chest floor.

items.name: Rune of Perthro
effects: Rerolls all pedestal items in the current room (One time use of the D6).
